title: Data Entry
snippet: I am working with a client in the construction industry in Alexandria, VA with an immediate need for an Administrative Assistant to join its growing team. For the right candidate, this position has long term potential! The hours for this position are 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M. Monday - Friday with no anticipated overtime. This position will provide support to 4 managers in the office.

title: Need Assistance with product sourcing and creating buy lists
snippet: I need a Virtual Assistant to source product leads to sell via Amazon. The main software used is Tactical Arbitrage and I will be looking for someone to go through all product search scans to find the most profitable items. The assistant would also be expected to create buy lists for Retail Arbitrage purposes, create folders for out of stock items (for future purchases), create lists for Online Arbitrage purchases, run searches for Amazon flips and Library searches and mark global mismatches. Proficiency with Tactical Arbitrage, Keepa, FBA Calculator and Microsoft Excel are required.
